node.title: Respecting Food
node.label: 11. September 2020
node.introduction: Have you ever thought about the meals you eat and given them a respect ranking? What does this even mean?

node.title: Top Tips for Picky Eaters
node.label: 10. September 2020
node.introduction: Some people just don't like a lot of food or let's just say, they like what they like and that's all there is to it!

node.title: Sweetcorn Pancakes & Tomato Salsa
node.introduction: Sometimes you just need a little change from the usual pancakes. This is where these savoury Mexican inspired pancakes come into their own. Served with the salsa and a nice home made guacamole you can't really go wrong. Best of all you can pack in 2 or 3 portions of veg and kids love them too.

node.title: Raspberry Ripple Pancakes with Pineapple Skewers
node.introduction: These quick pancakes are fun to make and have a pleasing pink ripple effect due to the crushed raspberries. Serve with a big dollop of yogurt and the pineapple skewers on the side and this basic recipe can be a tasty and nutritious breakfast, brunch or snack.

node.cover_image_alt: Raspberry Ripple Pancakes with Pineapple Skewers.

node.title: Greek Salad
node.introduction: Who doesn't love a Greek salad? This makes a great addition to any meal, picnic or BBQ. The protein from the feta and the healthy fats from the olive oil and olives bring balance making it a light but filling standalone meal too.

node.text:
A little bit of experimental baking today!ðŸ˜Ž Buckwheat & Flax Rolls
The pink ones are beetroot and date topped with sesame and poppy seeds and the lighter ones are carrot, courgette and turmeric topped with fennel,  pumpkin and sunflower seeds
Eaten warm with a homemade vegetable and bean soup. The pink ones could definitely pass for a sweet treat due to the dates and would also be really nice with a little cheese. 

These rolls are kind of a cross between a scone and soda bread. They are gluten and dairy free, a great source of fibre and are packed full of vitamins, minerals and antioxidants. Thanks @gkstories for the inspiration. #experimentalbakingsuccess #rebalancingyou #beetrootanddates #fibrefix #halftermbaking #pinkfood #pinkbread #eatyourcolours #spiceoflife #bakingfun #recipetesting #glutenfreerolls #glutendairyfreebaking #glutenfree #glutenfreerecipeshare #soupandrolls #veganbaking #veganrolls

Morning walk. I already posted this on my @kitchenstarscookingschool feed but I liked it so much I'm posting it here too! 
I love how calm the duck is just sitting chilling on top of a mini waterfall! 
Kinda how life is sometimes!

I try to get out for walk in nature everyday to get my fractal fix! Fractals are repeated shapes in nature.There's quite a bit of research looking at fractals in nature. They can be soothing and calming with one study reporting that they can reduce stress levels by up to 60%. So getting out for some fresh air is not only good for a bit of exercise it's great for our mood and minds too!

Wishing you all a wonderful Thursday, which means it's nearly the weekend! Yay! 

#fractalsinnature #fractalfix #walkinnature #moodlifting #getoutside #morningrituals #morningwalks #uplifting #miniwaterfall #rebalancingyou #duckchilling #movementismedicine #walkeveryday #rebalancingyoucommunity

Struggling to finish..... Only messing! Don't think I've ever left even a crumb of cake in my life!! Life is too short for that nonsense! 
Tea & cake is one of my favourite things in the world. 
This cake was so good it's called a 'Happiness' cake. Thank you @sainsburysmag for the inspiration, I made a few changes because well I can't just follow a recipe! That would be too easy!
I've sliced and frozen it to keep me from eating it all at once! Thank you @williamsonteas for making the best earl grey!! 
#teaandcaketime #earlgreytea #happinesscake #rebalancingyou #myfavoritething #eatcakebehappy  #functionalfoods #sundaybakingclub #sundaycake #cakecanbehealthy #glutenfreebaking #glutenfreecake

metadata.siteDescription: ENERGISE, RESTORE, NOURISH. I'm studying with the renowned Institute for Optimum Nutrition and will qualify next year. Until then, this is a place to inspire and share healthful information, tips, tricks and recipes. I hope to energise, restore and nourish your body mind and soul!
